column3: Perhaps you want to take a look at [our developer notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#coding-style-c) for some naming conventions. Note that the naming convention has changed, and newly added code doesn't need to matching surrounding code. :smiley:

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
